title: Extension host terminated unexpectedly.
body:
<!-- ⚠️⚠️ Do Not Delete This! bug_report_template ⚠️⚠️ -->

<!-- Use Help > Report Issue to prefill these. -->
- VSCode Version:
- OS Version:

Steps to Reproduce:

1. just open repository and getting error.
2.

<!-- Launch with `code --disable-extensions` to check. -->
Does this issue occur when all extensions are disabled?: Yes/No
yes: i have already remove all ext from VS code and also reinstall vs-code in my machine but getting same issue, i am not able to fix this issue.

node.body:
@vj21soni Please turn your antivirus back on and follow these steps:

>Before excluding this file. Do following things in the same order:-

> 1) Close vscode 
> 2) Restore that file from Quick Heal (needs to be done)
> Open "**Quarantine & Backup**" 
> Click **View Files** 
> Search **extensionHostProcess.js** in the list 
> Select that file and click **Restore**.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4236211/78976176-45a1c680-7b33-11ea-88bf-4348a56f3575.png)

> 3) Add that file to exclusion list(which you've already done).

You will either need to restart or reinstall after that
node.bodyText:
@vj21soni Please turn your antivirus back on and follow these steps:

Before excluding this file. Do following things in the same order:-



Close vscode
Restore that file from Quick Heal (needs to be done)
Open "Quarantine & Backup"
Click View Files
Search extensionHostProcess.js in the list
Select that file and click Restore.





Add that file to exclusion list(which you've already done).


You will either need to restart or reinstall after that
node.bodyHTML:
@vj21soni Please turn your antivirus back on and follow these steps:

Before excluding this file. Do following things in the same order:-

  1. Close vscode
  2. Restore that file from Quick Heal (needs to be done)
    Open "Quarantine & Backup"
    Click View Files
    Search extensionHostProcess.js in the list
    Select that file and click Restore.

  1. Add that file to exclusion list(which you've already done).

You will either need to restart or reinstall after that

bodyParsed.sent: @vj21soni Please turn your antivirus back on and follow these steps:

You will either need to restart or reinstall after that
